log_level :info log_location STDOUT node_name 'gmaxey' client_key '~/.chef/gmaxey.pem' validation_client_name 'electriccloud-validator' validation_key '~/.chef/electriccloud-validator.pem' chef_server_url 'https://api.opscode.com/organizations/electriccloud' syntax_check_cache_path '~/.chef/syntax_check_cache' cookbook_path '~/chef-repo/cookbooks'

# See http://docs.opscode.com/config_rb_knife.html for more information on knife configuration options
current_dir = File.dirname(__FILE__) log_level :info log_location STDOUT node_name "gmaxey" client_key "#{current_dir}/gmaxey.pem" validation_client_name "electriccloud-validator" validation_key "#{current_dir}/electriccloud-validator.pem" chef_server_url "https://api.opscode.com/organizations/electriccloud" cache_type 'BasicFile' cache_options( :path => "#{ENV['HOME']}/.chef/checksums" ) cookbook_path ["#{current_dir}/cookbooks"]

procedure.procedureName: 12. New agent chef node (agent on VM)

property.description:
ami-7efe7916 - 5.2 Agent, ubuntu, 64bit
Commander Agent already installed Commander 4.2 - ami-b3f0a0da

formalParameter.description: If Commander server is behind a firewall/VPN, you'll need to open an ssh tunnel. This requires an ssh client.

step.stepName: Give VM time to come up

step.subprocedure: Shut down VM and Remove Resource

formalParameter.description: Currently the Chef node name is the private hostname
Currently resource name is the Public hostname

step.stepName: Run Chef Client to apply cookbook recipe

procedure.procedureName: Get and put cookbook on server

step.command: ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i key.pem ubuntu@$[hostname] "chmod +x ElectricCommander-$[commanderVersion]"

ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i key.pem ubuntu@$[hostname] "sudo ./ElectricCommander-$[commanderVersion] --mode silent --installAgent --unixAgentUser ubuntu --unixAgentGroup ubuntu"

step.stepName: Add Commander Server to hosts file
step.command: ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i key.pem ubuntu@$[hostname] "echo 127.0.0.1 $[/server/settings/ipAddress] | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts"

ps -ef | grep "ssh -f"
echo Killing process number `ps -ef | grep "ssh -f" | awk '{print $2;exit}'`
kill `ps -ef | grep "ssh -f" | awk '{print $2;exit}'`

formalParameter.description: Job number that created the instance

procedure.procedureName: Shut down VM and Remove Resource
procedure.jobNameTemplate: Shut down VM and Remove Resource - $[/myJob/jobId]

formalParameter.description: Job number that created the instance

step.command: for cookbook in $[/javascript myWorkflow.cookbooks] do knife cookbook delete $cookbook --all -c "$[/myProject/knifeRbPath]" --yes done

formalParameter.description: ami-cd0360a4 - Ubuntu bare bones ami-b3f0a0da - Commander Agent installed

property.description: Commander Agent already installed Commander 4.2 - ami-b3f0a0da

step.stepName: Give VM time to come up

stateDefinition.subprocedure: 12. New agent chef node (agent on VM)
Shut down VM and Remove Resource
